attributes.action: retract his assertion that the many thousands of scientists and citizens who have doubts that the recent rise in global temperature is the direct result of the increase in CO2 caused by humans are "flat earthers" and "deniers".
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It demeans the office of Prime Minister for anyone privileged to serve the British people in that capacity to deliberately insult very large numbers of intelligent and educated people who have a genuine issue with the science by calling them "flat earthers" and implying, by the use of the term "denier", that they are as evil as holocuast deniers.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
